imdb.title: Mezon Ikkoku
imdb.plot: The misadventures of a young student and his landlady's romance.

episodes.title: Sorry to Keep You Waiting! I'm Kyoko Otonashi!
episodes.plot: Kyoko is the new manager and Maison catches her eye and falls in love.

episodes.title: Love Is in the Air? Which One Does Kyoko Love Best?
episodes.plot: It's Kyoko's first Christmas at Maison Ikkoku and love stricken Godai splurges half of his monthly budget on a present. But will he muster the courage to give it to her? And could it be true that Kyoko already has a boyfriend?

episodes.title: Hearts on Fire in the Dark! All Alone with Kyoko
episodes.plot: Godai needs to study for the University entrance exams but the other tenants of Maison seem to have made it their mission to make that difficult. Daydreaming about Maison's beautiful manager doesn't help his studies either.

episodes.title: Kyoko's Heart Goes Pitty-Pat! Godai Is Put to the Test
episodes.plot: It's finally exam time and Maison tenants are taking bets on which test Godai will flunk next. Kyoko is the only one who is being encouraging. But will Godai manage to pass any tests at all or is it another year of being ronin for him?

episodes.title: Kyoko's Climbing the Walls! Godai's Headed for the Hills
episodes.plot: Godai's granny comes to Maison but Godai is not around and won't face Maison until the exam results are in. Except how long can he go without clean underwear? A sneak visit home is in order. Exam results are finally posted. Did Godai pass?

episodes.title: Shocking Springtime! Kyoko's Secret
episodes.plot: Godai finds out that Kyoko is a window and she had named Soichiro, the dog, after her late husband. Godai contemplates his chances with Kyoko's heart still in dead man's grave.

episodes.title: Godai's Agony! The One Kyoko Loves
episodes.plot: To ingratiate himself with Kyoko and to earn some extra cash Godai agrees to tutor Kyoko's 12 year old niece Ikuko. He doesn't realize Kyoko is not fond of the idea and worries whether Godai will behave himself.

episodes.title: Godai's Unspeakable Declaration! If You're Going to Do It, Do It!
episodes.plot: Godai gets drunk and openly declares his love for Kyoko. She is actually impressed but how much of it will Godai remember once he sobers up?

episodes.title: The Mysterious Tennis Coach Is the Rival of Love
episodes.plot: To distract Kyoko from her worries Mrs. Ichinose convinces her to join the tennis club. Handsome tennis coach, Mitaka, is instantly smitten with Kyoko. Jealous Godai tries to thwart his advances.

episodes.title: Love Panic on the Beach
episodes.plot: Godai, Kyoko, Mitaka, Kentaro and Ikuko head to the beach. To Godai's delight Mitaka's romantic plans to woo Kyoko are spoiled when it turns out that Soichiro loves Mitaka but the feeling is decidedly not mutual.

episodes.title: Kentaro's First Love! What's Age Got to Do with It?
episodes.plot: After their trip to the beach Kentaro gets a crush on Ikuko. He and Godai discover that love is hard at any age.

episodes.title: One Entangled Evening! I Thought You Said You Loved Me?!
episodes.plot: Godai wants to ask Kyoko out on a movie date but she is going to a concert with Mitaka. Godai rebounds and goes to the movies with a cute coworker. Two couples run across each other and jealous sparks fly.

episodes.title: Godai the Gigolo...? Are You Going to Get That, or Shall I?
episodes.plot: Godai is suddenly getting a lot of calls from various girls on Kyoko's phone. Jealous Kyoko retaliates by installing a pay phone for residents. But things are not what they seem and someone has been pulling Kyoko's puppet strings.

episodes.title: Way to Go, Godai! The First Date with Kyoko
episodes.plot: On Kyoko's one year anniversary at Maison Ikkoku Godai asks her out to a restaurant. The date goes awry when they go to two different restaurants with similar sounding names.

episodes.title: The Play's the Thing, Not the Playing Around! The Show Must Go on!
episodes.plot: There is a festival at Godai's college and Kyoko and the gang come for a visit. Kyoko gets roped in to play a part in Godai's club puppet show and Godai is having trouble keeping it together.

episodes.title: Sympathy Scramble, If I Should Stumble.
episodes.plot: Kyoko twists her ankle playing tennis and is forced to stay in bed. In sympathy with her plight everyone is trying to feed her but she can only eat so much. The best present for injured Kyoko just might be indigestion medicine.

episodes.title: The Story of Kyoko's First Love on Rainy Days Like These
episodes.plot: Godai sulks in the rain while Kyoko and Kozue share an umbrella and then look at Kyoko's high school album over tea. Kyoko reminisces about falling in love with Soichiro who was a temporary teacher at her high school.

episodes.title: Kyoko's Gift! 'What, You Mean It's for Me?'
episodes.plot: It's another Christmas eve and Godai is very happy when Kyoko gives him a scarf she has knitted as a present. Is that a romantic gesture? But then it turns out she has knitted somethings for everybody.

episodes.title: Godai and Kyoko! An Evening for Two Means Double the Truoble
episodes.plot: Godai and Kyoko are all alone on the New Year's eve. It seems like a perfect opportunity for Godai but he is having trouble making a move.

episodes.title: Kyoko's Ticking Time Bomb! Godai's Extended Absence
episodes.plot: Godai keeps delaying his return from the Winter vacation and everyone is missing him, especially Kyoko. What could be keeping him? Could it have something to do with him getting two black eyes and not wanting Kyoko to see him like this?

episodes.title: Godai's Panic! The Cat Who Came to Ikkoku
episodes.plot: Godai's friend Sakamoto convinces him to take care of his kitten of for a few days. Drunk Godai agrees because the kitten is called Kyoko. He tries to keep it a secret because of no pet policy at Maison Ikkoku. Hilarity ensues.

episodes.title: Godai Gets a Shock! Kyoko Calls It Quits
episodes.plot: Trouble comes to Maison Ikkoku in the form of Kyoko's parents. They are trying to force her to quit her job and go back to using her maiden name. A big quarrel results. Kyoko's mom shows up at Maison Ikkoku and claims Kyoko quit.

episodes.title: Kyoko's Brush with Danger! Mother's Nefarious Plot
episodes.plot: With Kyoko absent movers move out her possessions. The tenants are hurt Kyoko would quit on them like that. Kyoko's mom gets Mrs. Ichinose on her side by telling her Kyoko's father is gravely ill and in a hospital. But is this all a ruse?

episodes.title: Godai in Confusion! Kozue's First Kiss
episodes.plot: Kozue gets Godai to visit her house and introduces him to her parents. He realizes he is there on approval. Kozue's talk of marriage unsettles Godai. She then tries to kiss him. Will he or won't he?

episodes.title: It This Corner: Godai vs. Mitaka! The Clash of the Proposals
episodes.plot: After a mixed doubles tennis match pitting Kyoko and Godai vs Mitaka and Mrs. Ichinose Mitaka proposes to Kyoko. She is not ready though and chooses to misunderstand him. What about Godai?

episodes.title: Godai's Out of It! Kyoko's on the Rampage
episodes.plot: While Godai is having dinner with Kozue Kyoko heads to a date with Mitaka. Mitaka's fear of dogs might once again stand in the way of romance though. Time to try gambling as a cure for romantic disappointments.

episodes.title: Soichiro Gone! Yakitori Memories
episodes.plot: Kentaro asks to walk Soichiro and looses him. Everyone is looking for Soichiro and Kyoko reminisces on how she came to own him.

episodes.title: Even Kyoko's Surprised! 'I'm Kentaro's Father'
episodes.plot: A stranger is seen at Maison and everyone is surprised it's Kentro's father who lost his job. Kentaro struggles with his feelings about his parents but they surprisingly come through for him at a parent/child sports meeting at his school.

episodes.title: Fall Festival Four-Up! All Swell That Ends in a Well
episodes.plot: Everyone is at a Fall festival dressed up in costumes and trying to play tricks on each other. The biggest trickster turns out to be Yotsuya. Will his tricks end well?

episodes.title: What! Kyoko Married!? Godai's Tearful Goodbye
episodes.plot: Kyoko is overheard talking about wedding clothing to Mitaka. Are they getting married!? Heartbroken Godai moves out and rents a new apartment. The trouble is the previous tenants won't leave.

episodes.title: Scandal at Ikkoku! Godai's... Shacking Up!?
episodes.plot: Kyoko thinks Godai is shacking up with the woman who who still lives at Godai's new place. Jealous and disappointed she refused to let him move back to Ikkoku. Is this the end of a beautiful friendship?

episodes.title: The Incredible, Unfogettable Egg! Yotsuya's Dangerous Gift
episodes.plot: Yotsuya, who has never given anyone anything, gives Godai an egg. What is the meaning of this mysterious present? Everyone is on the case but are too scared of Yotsuya to ask him or damage the egg.

episodes.title: The Case of the Shocking Diary. My Husband Had a Sweetheart!
episodes.plot: Mr. Otonashi asks Godai to bring Kyoko the diary of her late husband. The diary seems boring but there is a mention of a mysterious postcard. Kyoko is worried it's from some former girlfriend of Soichiro. Could she be right?

episodes.title: Overpowered by Love! The Grandma Yukari Gold Tooth Gauntlet!
episodes.plot: Godai's grandma comes for another visit. She wants Godai to choose between Kozue and Kyoko. After hearing about Mitaka she drags Godai and Kyoko to Mitaka's house for an awkward dinner.

episodes.title: The Great Date Race! Kyoko and Godai Have Left the Bulding
episodes.plot: Grandma sets up a date for Godai and Kyoko. The date is going well but they quickly find out that grandma sent Yotsuya, Akemi and Mrs. Ichinose to spy on them. Escaping from these interlopers is no easy feat.

episodes.title: A Kiss is Just a Kiss... But a Woman's Love Is Priceless
episodes.plot: Akemi's boyfriend breaks up with her and gives her a cigarette lighter as a parting gift. Breakups are hard and she can't let him go until she gets rid of the lighter.

episodes.title: Crazy Costume Constest! Kyoko's Amazing Transformation
episodes.plot: Kyoko buys a full length mirror and tries out dressing up in her old school uniform. Pretty soon it's a big dress up party and everyone is invited including Mitaka and Soichiro.

episodes.title: Godai's Dumped! Kozue Falls for Coach Mitaka!?
episodes.plot: Kozue wants affection and is not getting it from Godai. Coach Mitaka offers a sympathetic ear. Does this mean it's over for Kozue and Godai?

episodes.title: Love Takes Guts! Godai's Part Time Job Ploy!
episodes.plot: It's another Christmas at Maison Ikkoku. While cleaning her closet Kyoko finds a strange rock with green specks. She asks Godai to help her figure out what it is. Godai finds out the rock was the only present Kyoko got from her husband.

episodes.title: A Bittersweet Favor! Budding Christmas Love?
episodes.plot: Godai asks Sakamoto to help him investigate Kyoko's rock and Sakamoto loosed it on subway. While the rest of Maison parties and Kyoko worries about him Godai spends Christmas eve trying to find the lost rock.

episodes.title: Kyoko's Hot Spring Heart Stopper: Peeping Wars at the Outdoor Baths!
episodes.plot: It's New Year's and the whole Maison gang heads to hot springs. The baths a re separate and the guys try to peak at the women.

episodes.title: Godai Breaks His Lag! Chance for Love at the Hospital!
episodes.plot: Kyoko almost falls off the roof, Godai saves her but falls and breaks his leg. She takes care of him while he is recuperating in the hospital. They are getting closer which doesn't sit well with Mitaka who resorts to desperate measures.

episodes.title: Love Speaks! Godai and Mitaka Duke It Out at the Hospital!
episodes.plot: Godai and Mitaka are nursing broken legs and getting on each others nerves while trying to woo Kyoko who is taking care of them. Once out of the hospital they end up getting drunk together and bonding over their romantic disappointments.

episodes.title: Kentaro Freaks Out! Yotsuya's Frightening True Identity
episodes.plot: Kentaro finds a photo album that seems to show various pictures of Yotsuya looking the same and going back some 60 years. How can this be? Maison decides to investigate.

episodes.title: A Shocking Revelation: Kyoko Declares Her Love to Godai
episodes.plot: Because of his broken leg Godai fell behind in his studies. If he fails even one exam he has to repeat the whole year. Feeling she is responsible and to help him study Kyoko forbids parties at Maison.

episodes.title: Race for Kyoko! Skating Risk is Love's Battleground
episodes.plot: The gang heads to a skating rink where it is discovered that neither Godai nor Mitaka know how to skate. Romantic rivalry is a great motivator to learn though as they compete for Kyoko's favor.

episodes.title: Kyoko Loses It! Drunk and Crazy!
episodes.plot: Godai takes a part time job as a waiter. Naturally, the Maison crowd show up at his restaurant and booze it up. Kyoko tries to rein them in but ends up getting drunk.

episodes.title: Godai's Confession! I Want You to Know How I Feel!
episodes.plot: Kyoko's mom gets a cold and gets Kyoko to stay over and take care of her. She pretends to be sicker than she is to keep Kyoko from going back to Maison. Godai comes over for an awkward visit.

episodes.title: Mitaka Trains! Lover Boy. Can't Be Afraid of Dogs!
episodes.plot: Because of Kyoko's dog Soichiro Mitaka really wants to conquer his fear of dogs. The miscreants from Mason Ikkoku offer to help but is it wise for Mitaka to put his trust in them?

episodes.title: Kyoko in Love at First Sight!? A Strange Man Moves Into Mezon Ikkoku
episodes.plot: A strange new tenant, Mr. Mitsukoshi, takes up residence at Maison Ikkoku. He is welcome by all but Kyoko's remark that he reminds her of her late husband sets Godai to worry.

episodes.title: Even Yotsuya's Shocked! The Day Mezon Ikkoku Disappears
episodes.plot: It seems Mr. Mitsukoshi is harboring sinister plans concerning Maison Ikkoku. The others work to uncover his plot and stop it if they can.

episodes.title: Forgive Me Soichiro! Kyoko's Tearful Decison to Remarry
episodes.plot: It's another anniversary of Soichiro's death. Kyoko visits his grave and has to decide if she is ready to move on or remain true to his memory.

episodes.title: High School Girl Power! A War Against Kyoko's Love
episodes.plot: Godai gets a temporary position as a student-teacher at Kyoko's old all girl high school. This means one thing - girl trouble for Godai. Yagami, one of the girls in his class, takes particular liking to Godai.

episodes.title: Bare-Faced Attack! Operation Seduction
episodes.plot: With Godai completely unable to enforce proper boundaries with the girls in his class trouble follows and its name is Yagami. To make matters worse Kyoko comes to visit her old school. What will she think?

episodes.title: Pajama-Girl Charges In! Mezon Ikkoku in a Love Panic!
episodes.plot: Godai is still unable to handle Yagami's aggressive advances. She invites herself over to his place for a sleepover. Mayhem ensues.

episodes.title: Yagami Is Determined! I Won't Give Up My First Love
episodes.plot: On Godai's last day as a student-teacher Yagami makes a decision about him. Elsewhere Mitaka's relatives are trying to set up a date for him with a woman they want him to marry.

episodes.title: The Princess Cometh! Mitaka Is Her Prince Charming
episodes.plot: Mitaka has a date with Asuna Kujo, the girl his uncle wanted him to meet. She is lovely, wealthy and likes Mitaka but will Mitaka's fear of dogs once again spoil things? Godai gets a job at a daycare center.

episodes.title: Godai or Mitaka? A Woman's Heart Is on the Line
episodes.plot: It's decision time. The week Mitaka gave Kyoko to think over his proposal is up and she wants to talk to Godai who goes drinking instead. Kyoko is waiting for Mitaka but Asuna and her dogs are an unexpected wild card.

episodes.title: Be Still, My Beating Heart! Asuna Kujo's Very First Time
episodes.plot: Godai makes two tapes explaining his feelings: to Kyoko and to a little girl with similar name in his daycare who said she wants to marry him. That will not lead to a misunderstanding, will it? Asuna and Mitaka have an awkward date.

episodes.title: Caught in the Act! Kyoko and Mitaka, Hot and Heavy!
episodes.plot: Godai and Asuna catch Mitaka and Kyoko in a compromising situation. Godai is miserable but decides not to be selfish.

episodes.title: Come After Me, Godai! Kyoko Journeys Alone!
episodes.plot: Godai thinks he has a fresh chance with Kyoko but to get away from it all she has gone away on vacation. What else is there to do but go after her? However, catching Kyoko proves harder than expected.

episodes.title: All Right! Alone in the Bath with Kyoko
episodes.plot: Godai catches up to Kyoko in hot springs. Before they can sort out their relationship fresh trouble arises at Maison and calls Kyoko back home.

episodes.title: Yagami's Back! Just When You Least Expect Her!
episodes.plot: Yagami suddenly reappears in Godai's life and tricks Godai into tutoring her. She is paying him but is the money worth the trouble?

episodes.title: Godai's on the Edge! Trapped by a High School Girl!
episodes.plot: Mitaka tries a new way to deal with his fear of dogs. Yagami gets Godai to tutor her at her house. But is her overprotective father ok with the tutoring sessions?

episodes.title: Yagami's Scream! The Dangers of Private Lessons with Yotsuya!
episodes.plot: After what's happened at Yagami's house Godai refuses to continue tutoring her. Undeterred she hires Yotsuya instead.

episodes.title: Yagami's Challenge! I Won't Lose to the Widow!
episodes.plot: Yagami is convinced that her difficulties with Godai are all because of machinations by Kyoko. This means one thing - war.

episodes.title: Even Yagami Is Shocked! The Return of the Gold-Toothed Grandma!
episodes.plot: Godai's grandma comes for a surprise visit. Yagami tries to charm her but grandma proves a more difficult prey than Godai. Godai starts looking for a permanent job.

episodes.title: Grandma Yukari's Fighting Spirit. The Baseball Battle!
episodes.plot: A baseball game is organized with free drinks at stake and grandma is managing the Maison team. This proves a challenge as some of her players want to start celebrating before the game is over. Yagami meets Kozue in the cheering section.

episodes.title: Underwater Confusion! Godai's Suspicious Hickey!
episodes.plot: The gang goes to an outdoor pool at a swanky hotel where Godai secretly works part time as a waiter. Godai has a hickey which is embarrassing to explain and makes Kyoko jealous. Kyoko gets into an embarrassing situation of her own.

episodes.title: Farewell Grandma! Party on Down at Ueno Station
episodes.plot: It's grandma's farewell party and everyone at Maison including Soichiro, the dog, is all too happy to booze it up. Partying continues at the train station when grandma's train is delayed.

episodes.title: A Midsummer Night Dream! Godai Finds a Job!
episodes.plot: Grandma sent Godai and Kyoko a pair of matching kimonos to wear at a Fall festival. Mitaka thinks he's overcome his fear of dogs. Yagami's father turns out to be a big shot at a corporation Godai is interested in.

episodes.title: A Baby Is Born. Godai's Tearfully Happy Life
episodes.plot: Yagami's father doesn't remember his drunken promise to Godai to give him a job. On the way to the big job interview Godai meets a pregnant woman who urgently needs to get to the hospital for delivery.

episodes.title: Hostage Crisis at Ikkoku! Yagami Makes Herself at Home
episodes.plot: Things come to a head between Godai, Yagami and Yagami's father. Truth about Godai's reason for missing the interview is revealed. To force her father's hand Yagami moves into Maison Ikkoku.

episodes.title: All Quiet on the Job Hunt Front! Godai's Eleventh-Hour Save
episodes.plot: Yagami's father gets Godai a job at a small computer company and Yagami goes home. All seems well and Maison is eager to celebrate but is the celebration premature?

episodes.title: One-Track Love. Yagami and Asuna Never Say Die!
episodes.plot: Asuna still pines for Mitaka and both she and her dogs are ecstatic when he visits. Yagami is still trying to get her father to find Godai a job. When her refuses she again resorts to desperate measures.

episodes.title: I'll Wait! Kyoko's Double-Duty Declaration
episodes.plot: Mitaka finally clears the air with Asuna. He then surprises Kyoko who is visiting her husband's grave. And who is that hiding in the bushes? Kyoko makes an important decision about the future.

episodes.title: You Go, Godai! Yo Do Have Pride, After All!
episodes.plot: Godai really enjoys working at day care but still will not consider it as a permanent job option. Yagami finally gets her father to offer Godai another job recommendation. All Godai has to do is accept it.

episodes.title: I'm Not Sayin! The Cabaret Chronicles
episodes.plot: Just when things seemed to be going right Godai and Sakamoto wake up from a night of drinking and find themselves heavily in debt to an owner of a cabaret. Godai has to work off the debt while keeping it a secret from Kyoko.

episodes.title: I'm So Sorry, Kyoko! I Don't Deserve to Eat Your Lunch
episodes.plot: Godai loses his job at the daycare. The miscreants from Maison are mooching off him and boozing it up at the cabaret. Kyoko still does not suspect anything. Yagami finds out about Godai's new job.

episodes.title: Godai Goes Ga-Ga! Yagami's a Bunny Girl Now!?
episodes.plot: Yagami tries to get hired at the cabaret to help Godai pay off his debt. Kyoko finally learns the truth about Godai's job situation.

episodes.title: Obsessive Love! Asuna Just Won't Give Up!
episodes.plot: Asuna reappears and she is still after Mitaka. Godai continues to be easy prey to everyone wanting to take advantage of him. This time it's Kasumi, one of the cabaret's girls.

episodes.title: Perfect Papa! The 'Mister Mom' Godai Story
episodes.plot: Kasume has dumped her kids on Godai and ran off with a customer. Kyoko helps Godai take care of the kids while he looks for Kasume. Mitaka is trying to arrange a meeting for his parents to meet Kyoko. She is unaware of the scheme though.

episodes.title: Off to the Yokohama Border! Kyoko's Doing a Runner
episodes.plot: Mitake picks up Kyoko but an unexpected passenger tags along unbeknownst to them. Godai has to be dispatched to retrieve him. Mitaka's and Kyoko's families meet.

episodes.title: 'One Thousand Percent Suspicious!' Kyoko's Scandalous Night
episodes.plot: Mitaka lays down the charm and a hotel is booked. Will Kyoko succumb? Godai and Kyoko's father are afraid that she might and are looking for her and Mitaka. Kasume's kids are waiting for her at Maison. Will she come?

episodes.title: This Is the Critical Point! Godai and Mitaka's Duel of Fate!
episodes.plot: Kasume's kids are back with their mom. Mitaka's relatives enter him into a formal engagement with Asuna without telling him. Mitaka and Godai decide to fight it out for Kyoko but finding a place to fight proves harder than expected.

episodes.title: Shocking One Night! Asuna's Salad Day
episodes.plot: Kyoko slaps some sense into Godai. Asuna spends a night at Mitaka's apartment who is drunk after the failed fight with Godai. But after he sobers up Mitaka can't remember what happened.

episodes.title: Asuna's Pregnant? Mitaka's Surprise Marriage Announcement!!
episodes.plot: Mitaka thinks he got Asuna pregnant and formally proposes marriages to her. Asuna seems to confirm the pregnancy but is it all a big misunderstanding? Whether it is or not Mitaka is a man of his word.

episodes.title: Love Again?! Taste of a Kiss That Kozue Left!
episodes.plot: Mitaka is still struggling to accept his situation with Asuna. Kozue has an important decision to make and after a long absence comes to visit Godai. A goodbye kiss is misinterpreted.

episodes.title: Unrequited Love! Godai and Kyoko, It's Over Today?
episodes.plot: Kyoko is jealous and angry because of the kiss between Godai and Kozue. Kozue misinterprets Godai's words which means trouble for everyone and spoils Godai's homecoming to Maison. Godai gets an ultimatum.

episodes.title: Kyoko-san Quitting! Ikkoku-kan's Memory Far Away?
episodes.plot: After her big fight with Godai Kyoko leaves and is staying with her parents. Godai tries to explain to her what happened. In the meantime with Kyoko gone Maison is in desperate need of a manager. Who will it be?

episodes.title: Kyoko in Shock! Akemi and Godai's Unexpected Relation!
episodes.plot: Akemi tries to push Kyoko's buttons to get her back with Godai. The results are not quite what Akemi had in mind as Kozue sees Godai and Akemi together in a compromising situation.

episodes.title: Kozue-chan's Wedding! Godai's Love Is Forever?!
episodes.plot: Akemi tells Kyoko that she was with Godai at a hotel and Kyoko really lets Godai have it. Can Godai convince her to trust him? Kazue learns the truth about Godai and Akemi and has a heart to heart with Godai.

episodes.title: Sight of Spring? The Two's Hearts Are in Warm Feeling!!
episodes.plot: With Kozue engaged and all misunderstandings finally cleared nothing stands in the way and Godai and Kyoko except for the memory of her dead husband.

episodes.title: Alright! Godai-kun's Courageous Proposal!
episodes.plot: Just when Godai is ready to pop the big question to Kyoko it turns out that her father is sick and delirious with fever and is violently opposed to any possible engagement between Kyoko and Godai.

episodes.title: Ah, Excitement! Grandma's Love Embosomed in the Ring
episodes.plot: Godai takes Kyoko to meet his parents. But if he thought he could leave the Maison crowd behind he has another thing coming.

episodes.title: As Long as This Love Lasts! Ikkoku-kan Is Forever...!!
episodes.plot: It's finally wedding bells for Godai and Kyoko and everyone is invited even Mitaka and pregnant Asuna. Several months pass and Kyoko arrives home from the hospital with a new baby girl.
